root.name: Pax Imperia: Eminent Domain
root.description: The game was originally announced in 1995 set to be developed by Changeling Software (later Heliotrope Studios) and published by Blizzard Entertainment, and is a sequel to the 1992 4X classic Pax Imperia. In 1996, Blizzard sold the rights to THQ as they felt it would compete with their upcoming title StarCraft.
